name.jp: フリッカー・ブルーム

description.en: This tip is more then just decoration, it's aerodynamic too! Maximum Speed: 38 km/h.
description.ar: This tip is more then just decoration, it's aerodynamic too! Maximum Speed: 38 km/h.
description.br: Esta ponta não é só uma decoraçãozinha bonita, é aerodinâmica também! Velocidade Máxima: 38km/h.
description.cns: 它的零件可不只是装饰，还是符合空气动力学的！最大速度 38 km/h。
description.de: Diese Spitze dient nicht nur der Dekoration, sie ist sogar aerodynamisch! Höchstgeschwindigkeit: 38 km/h.
description.fi: This tip is more then just decoration, it's aerodynamic too! Maximum Speed: 38 km/h.
description.fil: This tip is more then just decoration, it's aerodynamic too! Maximum Speed: 38 km/h.
description.fr: Balai volant de niveau intermédiaire (38 km/h).
description.id: Tip ini lebih dari sekedar dekorasi, itu juga aerodinamis! Kecepatan Maksimum: 38 km/jam.
description.it: This tip is more then just decoration, it's aerodynamic too! Maximum Speed: 38 km/h.
description.jp: 先端のトンガリはただ装飾ではなく、空力のことも考えられて作られています。最高速度: 38 km/h
description.kr: 이 팁은 단순한 장식이 아니라 공기 역학적이기도합니다! 최고 속도 : 38km/h.
description.nl: This tip is more then just decoration, it's aerodynamic too! Maximum Speed: 38 km/h.
description.pl: This tip is more then just decoration, it's aerodynamic too! Maximum Speed: 38 km/h.
description.ru: Наконечник не только красивый, но ещё и обтекаемый! Максимальная скорость: 38 км/ч.
description.sp: Esa punta es más que simple decoración, ¡también es aerodinámica! Velocidad Máxima: 38 km/h.
description.sw: This tip is more then just decoration, it's aerodynamic too! Maximum Speed: 38 km/h.
description.th: เคล็ดลับนี้เป็นมากกว่าแค่การตกแต่ง แต่ยังเป็นแอโรไดนามิกอีกด้วย! ความเร็วสูงสุด: 38 กม./ชม.
description.vi: Mẹo này không chỉ là trang trí mà còn mang tính khí động học nữa! Tốc độ tối đa: 38 km/h.
